title: BomberMan
description:
The most time consuming p5js project i ever made, it is a challenge that i put up on my self to redo a game my older brother did years ago, it is currently a PC version only, so no why you could move the character without a keybord.
 instruction on how to play: e=up, d=down, f=right, s=left, b=putBomb.
 it is currently really low on functionalities, updates comming soon. #needs_inputs_for_mobile #needs_multiplayer_mode #needs_a_goal
